title: What is advanced web development? - Quora

response.answer_text: Advance web development is developing web pages with lots of features for example dynamic pages and log in section. for advanced web development u need to know various languages like html5, css , java script and php. in advance web development html5 is used as content adder and css is used for styling the contents of your web page. java script is used for functioning of your web page and php is like the back end of your web site .
